page.title: 06Industry
page.content: In 1954 the BXL factory was built on a site of the old Darton Main Colliery.BXL stands for Bakelite Xylonite Limited and there are 450 workers.At the{factory}they make different types of polythene bags.To make the bags,plastic granules are melted down.Some of the granules are clear,and make clear bags.The others are white and make carrier bags which will have a design printed on later. Shaw Carpet Factory stands where there used to be a small rugmill.It is the largest of its kind in Europe making carpets which are sent all over the world.There are 480 workers{ {employed}there. At Barugh there is an{industrial {estate.}Here there are transport firms,a steel erection company,fuel distributors,civil engineering company,etc.,with room for others.
